message.content:
cs.DM, cs.IT, cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.LO

Reasoning: 
- cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics): Cellular automata are often studied in the context of discrete mathematics, and this paper presents a new result in this area.
- cs.IT (Information Theory): Cellular automata can be used to model information processing, and this paper may be of interest to researchers in this field.
- cs.CG (Computational Geometry): The heptagrid is a geometric object, and this paper may be relevant to researchers studying computational geometry.
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): Cellular automata can be seen as a type of algorithm, and this paper presents a new result in this area.
- cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science): Cellular automata can be used to study the behavior of logical systems, and this paper may be of interest to researchers in this field.
